tool_description: Menyajikan data mudik berdasarkan beberapa sumber berita terpercaya
name: Data Mudik
title: Data Mudik

api_list.name: Data Individu
api_list.description: Dapatkan data dari sumber yang spesifik
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://data-mudik.p.rapidapi.com/news/tempo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "data-mudik.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://data-mudik.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "data-mudik.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
